titleStmt.title: To the Honourable the House of Commons assembled in high court of Parliament: the humble remonstrance and petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the city of London, in Common Councell assembled.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

notesStmt.note: Against the Independents, in favour of church union with the Scotch, etc.--Thomason Catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
